description.value: You move to provide immediate care to those who need it. Stride, then use one of the following: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Battle Medicine]{Battle Medicine} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Treat Poison]{Treat Poison}. You can spend a second action to instead Stride and then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Administer First Aid]{Administer First Aid} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Treat Condition]{Treat a Condition}.
